info.title: OpenBankProject-Counterparty
info.description: An Open Source API for Banks. (c) TESOBE Ltd. 2011 - 2018. Licensed under the AGPL and commercial licences.

get.description:
Get metadata of one other account. Returns only the metadata about one other bank account (OTHER_ACCOUNT_ID) that had shared at least one transaction with ACCOUNT_ID at BANK_ID.

Authentication via OAuth is required if the view is not public.

delete.description: Delete corporate location of other bank account. Delete the geolocation of the counterparty's registered address

post.description: Add the geolocation of the counterparty's registered address

put.description: Update the geolocation of the counterparty's registered address

delete.description: Delete image url of other bank account.

post.summary: Add image url to other bank account.
post.description: Add a url that points to the logo of the counterparty

put.description: Update the url that points to the logo of the counterparty

delete.summary: Delete more info of other bank account.

post.description: Add a description of the counter party from the perpestive of the account e.g. My dentist.

put.description: Update the more info description of the counter party from the perpestive of the account e.g. My dentist.

delete.description: Delete open corporate url of other bank account.

post.summary: Add Open Corporates URL to Counterparty
post.description: Add open corporates url to other bank account.

put.summary: Update Open Corporates Url of Counterparty
put.description: Update open corporate url of other bank account.

delete.description: Delete physical location of other bank account.

post.summary: Add physical location to other bank account.
post.description: Add geocoordinates of the counterparty's main location

put.description: Update geocoordinates of the counterparty's main location

delete.summary: Delete url of other bank account.

post.summary: Add url to other bank account.
post.description: A url which represents the counterparty (home page url etc.)

put.summary: Update url of other bank account.
put.description: A url which represents the counterparty (home page url etc.)

delete.description:
Deletes the private alias of the other account OTHER_ACCOUNT_ID.

Authentication is Optional Authentication is required if the view is not public.

get.description:
Returns the private alias of the other account OTHER_ACCOUNT_ID.

Authentication is Optional Authentication is required if the view is not public.

post.description:
Creates a private alias for the other account OTHER_ACCOUNT_ID.

Authentication is Optional Authentication is required if the view is not public.

put.description:
Updates the private alias of the counterparty (AKA other account) OTHER_ACCOUNT_ID.

Authentication is Optional Authentication is required if the view is not public.

delete.description:
Deletes the public alias of the other account OTHER_ACCOUNT_ID.

Authentication is Optional Authentication is required if the view is not public.

get.summary: Get public alias of other bank account.
get.description: Returns the public alias of the other account OTHER_ACCOUNT_ID. Authentication is Optional Authentication is Mandatory if the view is not public.

post.summary: Add public alias to other bank account.
post.description:
Creates the public alias for the other account OTHER_ACCOUNT_ID.

Authentication is Optional Authentication is required if the view is not public.

Note: Public aliases are automatically generated for new 'other accounts / counterparties', so this call should only be used if the public alias was deleted.

The VIEW_ID parameter should be a view the caller is permitted to access to and that has permission to create public aliases.

put.summary: Update public alias of other bank account.
put.description:
Updates the public alias of the other account / counterparty OTHER_ACCOUNT_ID.

Authentication is Optional Authentication is required if the view is not public.

get.description: Get other account of a transaction. Returns details of the other party involved in the transaction, moderated by the view (VIEW_ID). Authentication via OAuth is required if the view is not public.

Get the Counterparties (Explicit) for the account / view.

Authentication is Mandatory

post.description:
Create Counterparty (Explicit) for an Account.

In OBP, there are two types of Counterparty.

  • Explicit Counterparties (those here) which we create explicitly and are used in COUNTERPARTY Transaction Requests

  • Implicit Counterparties (AKA Other Accounts) which are generated automatically from the other sides of Transactions.

Explicit Counterparties are created for the account / view They are how the user of the view (e.g. account owner) r

get.description:
Information returned about the Counterparty specified by COUNTERPARTY_ID:

Authentication is Mandatory

get.summary: Get Other Accounts of one Account.
get.description:
Returns data about all the other accounts that have shared at least one transaction with the ACCOUNT_ID at BANK_ID. Authentication is Optional

Authentication is required if the view VIEW_ID is not public.

Returns data about the Other Account that has shared at least one transaction with ACCOUNT_ID at BANK_ID. Authentication is Optional

Authentication is required if the view is not public.
